overview: Ars Nova is in residence in the Poitou-Charentes and Poitiers and mission in the Nord-Pas-de-Calais. Its activities are funded by the Ministry of Culture and Communication (DRAC de Poitiers and Lille), the Poitou-Charentes, Nord-Pas-de-Calais, the city of Poitiers and received the support of SACEM and SPEDIDAM.
title: Symphonie Déchirée
